source:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Nananji desires more information for Louisoix's biography.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
黒渦団：軍令部付近にいるナナンジは、伝記執筆の取材を続けたいようだ。

source:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_SEQ_01<tab>At the Drowning Wench, Nananji expresses his desire to know what motivated Louisoix to go so far as to sacrifice himself for a land not his own. If he had people near him in his final moments, the writer muses, they may be able to provide some insights─and by a fortuitous turn, Baderon, who chances to overhear your conversation, happens to know an individual who served among the Archon's guard at Carteneau. Known by the name of Orn Guincum, this former officer of the Maelstrom has since turned to adventuring, and there is a possibility he is presently at the Moraby Drydocks. Upon learning of this, Nananji immediately sets off, eager not to miss the opportunity to speak with the man.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストには「<var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var><var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> レベルアジャスト」が、
　設定されています。

ナナンジと話し、バデロンから情報を得た。低地ラノシアのモラビー造船廠で「ナナンジ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_SEQ_02<tab>Upon arriving at the Drydocks, Nananji proposes splitting up to make inquiries after Orn. Hopefully, someone in the area can lead you to him.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_SEQ_02<tab>ナナンジと話し、オルン・グインカムの情報を集めることになった。モラビー造船廠にいる人に話を聞いてみよう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_SEQ_03<tab>Piecing together the information from the locals, you believe you know where Orn may be found. Armed with the knowledge, you go to rejoin Nananji.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_SEQ_03<tab>人々の話を聞き、オルン・グインカムの手がかりを得た。モラビー造船廠で「ナナンジ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_SEQ_04<tab>You share with Nananji your finding that Orn may have bought a Nymeia lily, and thence took himself to the mark of the Spinner nearby. Wasting no time, the two of you hurry to the area.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_SEQ_04<tab>ナナンジと話した。モラビー造船廠南東の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB8D501 /var>」で辺りを見渡そう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_SEQ_05<tab>At the end of your search, you and Nananji come face-to-face with Orn Guincum. Recognizing you as the hero of Operation Archon, the man agrees to tell you his tale, and in grim tones recounts Louisoix's final moments. Even when Bahamut had broken free and all hells loose, he and his fellow guards were determined to stay at the Archon's side to the bitter end. Their charge, however, had beseeched them not to sacrifice themselves here, but to live and bear the light for others to follow. “Every soul who lives to determine their own fate is a source of hope”─with these words ringing in his mind, Nananji is reaffirmed in his belief that Louisoix was not an all-powerful savior one reads about in tales, but merely an ordinary man. Yet that man never forsook Eorzea, and stood for this realm to the last that all might know a brighter future. In this way, the budding writer has found not only an angle for Louisoix's biography, but newfound determination to tell the great man's tale.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_SEQ_05<tab>オルン・グインカムと会い、話を聞いた。モラビー造船廠南東で「ナナンジ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_SEQ_06<tab>In response to Nananji's thanks, Orn offers thanks of his own for being afforded the chance to share Louisoix's words. The erstwhile lieutenant then takes his leave and wishes you well on your travels. Having seen the man off, Nananji suggests returning to Ul'dah, where he would present you with your reward.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_SEQ_06<tab>ナナンジと話し、オルン・グインカムに別れを告げた。ウルダハの不滅隊：作戦本部前で「ナナンジ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_SEQ_07<tab>Speaking in front of the Hall of Flames, Nananji expresses his gratitude at being able to hear the accounts of those who lived the Calamity. He also declares that he has attained a measure of closure, having realized through his inquiries that Louisoix had fought with his all as simply another defender of the realm. Though much work remains to be done, Nananji promises that he will not rest until the biography goes to print, and you look forward to the day every man, woman, and child may know the tale of the great Archon.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_SEQ_07<tab>ナナンジと話した。彼の取材は無事完了し、いつの日かルイゾワの伝記が世に出るだろう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Nananji at the Moraby Drydocks.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_TODO_00<tab>モラビー造船廠のナナンジと話す

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_TODO_01<tab>Gather information at the Moraby Drydocks.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_TODO_01<tab>モラビー造船廠で情報を集める

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Nananji.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_TODO_02<tab>ナナンジと話す

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_TODO_03<tab>Survey the designated location southeast of the Moraby Drydocks.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_TODO_03<tab>モラビー造船廠南東の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB8D501 /var>で見渡す

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Nananji.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_TODO_04<tab>ナナンジと話す

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Nananji in Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_TODO_05<tab>ウルダハのナナンジと話す

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_001<tab>You'll continue accompanying me, then? Wonderful! Come, let's head to the Drowning Wench to discuss our next move.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_001<tab>取材に付き合ってくれるんだね、ありがとう！
それじゃあ、溺れた海豚亭で軽く打ち合わせをしようか。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_002<tab>Our research proceeds apace so far. We've even learned things not found in literature.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_002<tab>おかげで取材の成果は上々だ。
文献にも載ってないような、貴重な話が聞けてよかった。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_003<tab>But tell me─based on what you've heard from our interviewees, what is your opinion of Louisoix?
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_003<tab>ところで……
君は彼らの話を聞いて、賢人ルイゾワのことをどう思った？

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_Q1_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_A1_000_001<tab>He's an exceptional leader.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_A1_000_001<tab>優れた指導者だと感じた

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_A1_000_002<tab>He had a difficult task.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_A1_000_002<tab>大変そうだった

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_A1_000_003<tab>Others deserve more credit.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_A1_000_003<tab>功績の大半は冒険者のものでは？

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_004<tab>I agree, he possessed great leadership. If not, he couldn't have established the framework to realize his plans, no matter how brilliant they may have been.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_004<tab>そうだね、すばらしい指導力だ。
深い知識と柔軟な発想で策を練ったことに加え、
それを実行する体制を作り上げたんだから。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_005<tab>Indeed. From an imperial invasion to rampaging primals to Nael van Darnus's scheme, he had to contend with the toughest of problems.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_005<tab>そうだね、帝国軍の侵攻に蛮神問題、
そしてネール・ヴァン・ダーナスが密かに描いた策謀……。
どれも難題ばかりだからね。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_006<tab>Perhaps. Without the Warriors of Light, his plans may have come to naught. But without Louisoix himself, there wouldn't have been any plan at all.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_006<tab>たしかに「光の戦士」たちがいなければ、
賢人ルイゾワの策も、空振りに終わっていたかもしれない。
とはいえ彼がいなければ、策すらなかったのも事実だと思うよ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_007<tab>What struck me was how grateful the interviewees were to Louisoix for bringing their nations together in cooperation. It was nothing short of necessary for our survival.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_007<tab>僕が特に感銘を受けたのは、証言者たちが皆一様に、
各国協力の道筋を示したことを感謝していた点さ。
その姿勢こそが未来を紡いだ、って。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_010<tab>Yet in knowing this, I can't help but wonder. In his capacity as a tactician, it seems to me he had done more than enough by devising a plan and facilitating its execution.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_010<tab>でも同時に、それを知ったからこそ新たな疑問が浮かんだんだ。
事態に対応する体制を作り、軍師として策を練ったのなら、
本来は異邦の人であるルイゾワは、十分この地に貢献したはず。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_100_010<tab>He went far beyond that, risking life and limb on the front lines for a land not his own. Perhaps he needed to be there for the ritual. Perhaps he felt a sense of duty...
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_100_010<tab>なのにどうして、彼は最前線で命を賭し続けられたんだろう？
もちろん、秘儀を成就させられるのが彼だけだとか、責任感とか、
そういう理由があるのはわかるよ、わかるけど……。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_011<tab>Even so, as noble as it is to desire to help others, what good is it if you end up sacrificing yourself?
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_011<tab>『助けられる人が目の前にいるときに、
　我が身を案じて助けぬというのは怠惰というもの』
とは言っても、自分が命を落としちゃ仕方ないじゃないか……。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_012<tab>What was it that compelled Louisoix to go to Carteneau, and what went through his mind as the battle unfolded? In order to do his biography justice, I feel I need to know these things.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_012<tab>だから僕は、せめて、
ルイゾワがどんな思いでカルテノーに臨んだのかを知りたい。
伝記を書くなら、それは欠かせないことのような気がするんだよ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_013<tab>If Louisoix had people near him at the time, perhaps he shared words with them in his final moments─words that could provide some insights. But where to begin searching for such individuals, assuming they exist...?
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_013<tab>それで、もしカルテノーで賢人ルイゾワの近くに誰かがいたら、
最後に何か言葉を交わしたかもしれないと思ったんだ。
けど、うーん、今からそんな人を探すのは難しいよなあ……！

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_BADERON_000_014<tab>Sorry, friends, but I couldn't 'elp but overhear yer conversation. Jus' so 'appens I know a bloke as served among Louisoix's guard at Carteneau.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_BADERON_000_014<tab>よう、お前さんたちの話が聞こえてきたんだが……
カルテノーでルイゾワを護衛した兵なら知ってるぞ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_015<tab>Truly!? You know someone who was with him!?
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_015<tab>ルイゾワの、護衛兵！？
え、そんな人がいたんですか？

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_BADERON_000_016<tab>Aye, an' far as I'm aware, 'e wasn't keepin' the fact a secret. Jus' fer good measure, though─why do ye wants to speak with him?
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_BADERON_000_016<tab>ああ、奴さんも別に秘密にしてはいなかったはずだ。
ただまあ……念のため、情報を何に使うかは教えてもらいたい。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_BADERON_000_017<tab>Louisoix's biography, eh? In that case, I reckon the bloke would be willin' to cooperate.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_BADERON_000_017<tab>ほう、賢人ルイゾワの伝記ね……そりゃ面白い。
そういうことなら、あいつはむしろ協力を申し出るかもしれんな。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_BADERON_000_018<tab>Orn Guincum's 'is name, an' 'e was a lieutenant o' the Maelstrom. After the Calamity, 'e turned to adventurin' so as to be o' greater 'elp to the commonfolk.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_BADERON_000_018<tab>護衛を務めた男の名は「オルン・グインカム中甲士」。
元黒渦団のミッドランダー、霊災後に冒険者になった変わり種さ。
より民衆に近しい立場から人の助けになりたかったそうだ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_020<tab>A Maelstrom officer-turned-adventurer... We'd be most keen to speak with him! Where might he be found?
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_020<tab>元黒渦団将校の冒険者……ぜひ話を聞いてみたい！
その人は、いまどこに？

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_BADERON_000_021<tab>When Orn dropped in the other day, 'e said that 'e had business at the Moraby Drydocks. If yer lucky, might be as 'e's still there.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_BADERON_000_021<tab>お前さんたち、本当にツイてるな……
オルンはちょうどつい先日、ここに寄ったんだ。
これから、モラビー造船廠へ行くとか話してたっけかな。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_023<tab>Understood! We're in your debt!
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_023<tab>貴重な情報、ありがとうございます！

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_024<tab>We can't let this chance pass us by, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Let's take ourselves to the Drydocks at once!
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_024<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、このチャンスは逃せない。
さっそく「モラビー造船廠」へ行ってみよう……！

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_030<tab>Right, where could Orn be? In hindsight, we should have asked what he looks like. His name would suggest he's a Midlander, but hmmm...
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_030<tab>さて、オルンさんは……
うーん、それらしい人は見当たらないなぁ。
だけど簡単に諦めるわけにもいかないぞ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_031<tab>Well, nothing for it but to make inquiries. Let's split up for the task and meet again here.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_031<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、手分けして、
オルンさんを見かけた人がいないか聞き込みしてみよう。
何かわかったら、またこのあたりで合流しようか。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_MOBB04780_100_031<tab>Welcome, welcome. From fishing tackle to potions, we have various wares in stock. Please have a browse.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_MOBB04780_100_031<tab>いらっしゃい。
仕事道具に釣り餌にお酒、
ちょっとした修理なんかも請け負ってるわよ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_032<tab>I thought I had gotten better at making inquiries, but it's not so easy if they aren't already inclined to speak... How do you do it, day in and day out?
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_032<tab>人に話を聞くのは慣れたと思ったけど、
自分から話してくれる人以外だと、だいぶ勝手が違う。
いつも聞き込みしてる冒険者、凄いんだな……。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_MOBA04780_000_033<tab>Orn? As it happens, I spoke with him just earlier.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_MOBA04780_000_033<tab>オルンさんなら、少し前に会ったよ。
久しぶりに見かけたから挨拶してみたんだけど、
そうしたら花を売っている店はないかってきかれたんだ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_MOBA04780_000_034<tab>He said that he wanted to buy flowers, so I directed him to a vendor. Not sure where he is as of now, though.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_MOBA04780_000_034<tab>だから、よろず屋を紹介したんだが……
今どこにいるかまではわからんわ、すまん。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_MOBA04780_100_034<tab>Ever since the Calamity, Orn's been helping people across the realm rebuild. It's a fine thing and all, but with his skills, I reckon he could do far better than menial labor.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_MOBA04780_100_034<tab>オルンさん、霊災後は各地の復興に協力してたんだと。
わざわざ地味な労働を買って出るなんて、
なんだか頭が下がるよな……。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_MOBB04780_000_035<tab>I'm sorry, but I've only just started helping out here. I'm still learning our customers' names.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_MOBB04780_000_035<tab>ごめんなさいね。
よろず屋の仕事を手伝いはじめたのは最近だから、
あんまり、お客さんの名前とか知らないのよ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_MOBB04780_000_036<tab>I couldn't say if it's the person you're after, but a man did come by earlier who appeared to be an adventurer. He bought a Nymeia lily that we're currently trialing.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_MOBB04780_000_036<tab>でも、オルンさんって人かどうかはわからないけど、
冒険者らしい男性ならついさっきも見たわ。
お試しで仕入れたニメーヤリリーのお花を買ってくれたの。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_MOBB04780_100_036<tab>I couldn't say if it's the person you're after, but a man did come by earlier who appeared to be an adventurer. He bought a Nymeia lily that we're currently trialing.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_MOBB04780_100_036<tab>オルンさんって人かどうかはわからないけれど、
ニメーヤリリーを買っていった男性は見たわよ。
どこかにお供えしてるんじゃないかしらね。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_MOBC04780_000_037<tab>Lookin' for an Orn Guincum, you say? Don't know anyone by that name, I'm afraid.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_MOBC04780_000_037<tab>オルン・グインカム……？
すまんが、そんな名の知人はいないよ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_MOBC04780_000_038<tab>I did walk by an unfamiliar fellow just now, though, over by the mark of the Spinner. He had a flower in his hand, so he caught my eye.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_MOBC04780_000_038<tab>知人以外で見かけたのは、
ニメーヤの秘石近くですれ違った男くらいだな。
花を持っていたから印象に残ってるんだ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_MOBC04780_100_037<tab>While I don't know an Orn Guincum, I did see an unfamiliar fellow just now, over by the mark of the Spinner. He had a flower in his hand, so he caught my eye.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_MOBC04780_100_037<tab>知人以外となると、ニメーヤの秘石あたりで、
妙にガタイのいい男とすれ違ったくらいだ。
花を持ってたから印象に残ってるんだ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_SYSTEM_000_039<tab>You have an inkling as to where Orn might be. Time to rejoin Nananji.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_SYSTEM_000_039<tab>オルン・グインカムらしき人物の行き先がわかった。
ナナンジと話してみよう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_040<tab>There you are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Were you able to learn anything?
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_040<tab>あ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、どうだった？

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_041<tab>So a man who could be Orn bought a Nymeia lily, then went to the mark of the Spinner...
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_041<tab>ふむふむ……君が聞いてきた情報を総合すると、
オルンさんらしき男性は、ニメーヤリリーを買ったようだね。
そして、ニメーヤの秘石の方へ向かったと……。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_042<tab>If we hurry there, we might be able to find him. Let's go.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_042<tab>よし、僕らも行ってみよう。
今すぐ向かえば、会えるかもしれない！

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_043<tab>If he was only just seen, he should still be nearby...
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_043<tab>花を買ったのがついさっきなら、
この辺りにいる可能性もあるはずだけど……。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_500<tab>Begging your pardons, sir, but are you Lieutenant Orn Guincum?
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_500<tab>失礼……
オルン・グインカム中甲士でしょうか？

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_501<tab>I haven't been a lieutenant for years, but aye, that's me.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_501<tab>すでに黒渦団は退役しているが……
たしかに、私がオルンだ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_100_501<tab>What can I do for you?
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_100_501<tab>それで……君たちは？

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_502<tab>I realize this is sudden, but...
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_502<tab>唐突にすみません、実は……

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_503<tab>So you're writing Louisoix's biography, and want to hear my account as someone who was near on hand at Carteneau...
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_503<tab>なるほど……ルイゾワ様の伝記を書くため、
カルテノーで近くにいた私に戦場での様子を聞きたい、と。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_504<tab>There must be a reason that you're here too─the Warrior of Light who led us to victory in Operation Archon. Very well, I will tell you my tale.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_504<tab>これも何かの因果であろうな……光の戦士の如しと言われ、
マーチ・オブ・アルコンズ作戦でも活躍した英雄殿にならば、
喜んでお伝えしましょうぞ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_505<tab>Now then, where to begin...
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_505<tab>さて、何から話したものか……

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_506<tab>As you know, the battle was fought over the land where Dalamud was expected to fall. In the beginning, neither side was able to gain the upper hand. But when the imperials deployed their magitek armor, our ranks were thrown into disarray.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_506<tab>……あの戦いは、ダラガブの予想落下地点を巡って争われた。
当初は一進一退が続いたが、帝国側の魔導アーマー投入により、
エオルゼア同盟軍の戦列が乱されてね。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_507<tab>Those charged with protecting Louisoix like me could only watch the carnage from afar. And though our forces managed to hold out thanks to the adventurer contingent, we sustained grievous casualties.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_507<tab>ダラガブを押し返すべく術式の展開を急ぐルイゾワ様と、
護衛たる我々は、混乱する前線を見ていることしかできなかった。
冒険者部隊の活躍で全滅は免れたものの、被害は甚大……。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_508<tab>But the real tragedy was what followed. As Dalamud hurtled towards us, it began shedding fragments of itself before finally bursting open to unleash the primal Bahamut.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_508<tab>だが、本当の惨劇はそのあとだった。
巨大な破片を落としながらダラガブが地上に迫り……
そして、黒き龍の蛮神……バハムートが現れたのだ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_509<tab>As all below looked on in shock, the battle completely forgotten, Bahamut took wing and spewed fire all over the land. Men and magitek armor alike were set ablaze and sent flying like so many insects.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_509<tab>誰もが戦いを忘れて立ちすくむ中、
ヤツは上空を飛翔し、大地に爆炎を撒き散らした。
人が虫のように吹き飛び燃えていく様に、私は慄いたよ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_510<tab>I only realized that I had stopped breathing when a commanding voice broke my trance. “You've done enough,” Louisoix told us. “Now fly! Fly and save yourselves!”
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_510<tab>しかし、震えあがっていたところに、鋭い声が響いた。
「死にとらわれるな、もはや護衛は不要、逃げよ！」とね。
言うまでもなく、ルイゾワ様の声だ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_511<tab>But like my fellow guards, I wanted to remain. I couldn't charge into battle beside my comrades; at the very least, I would do my duty here and protect Louisoix to the last.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_511<tab>私は踏みとどまろうとした……だってそうだろう？
戦場で仲間とともに戦えなかった私にとって、
あの方の護衛こそが、命に代えても果たすべき使命なのだから。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_512<tab>But upon seeing us standing there, not making to move, Louisoix smiled and spoke thus: “If you would give your lives to protect something, then protect my hopes.”
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_512<tab>しかし、ルイゾワ様は静かに笑ってこう言ったのだ。
「命を懸けるというなら、わしの志を護ってはくれんか」とな。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_513<tab>“Every soul who lives to determine their own fate is a source of hope, bright and brilliant. So live, I bid you, and be among those who bear the light for others to follow.”
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_513<tab>「人そのものが灯であり、人が己の意思で切り開く未来こそ希望。
　わしは、ひとつでも多くの希望を残したい。
　ゆえにどうか諦めず、生きるためにこそ足掻いてほしい」

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_514<tab>Those words awakened us to a greater purpose. If there was hope in my living, then I would live as Louisoix bid. No matter what, I would survive. And so, together with my fellows, I began making my retreat.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_514<tab>その言葉を聞いて、私は仲間とともに撤退を開始したよ。
この矮小な命を繋げることをあの方が希望と言ってくれるのなら、
恥だろうと何だろうと絶対に生き延びてやると、そう思ったのだ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_515<tab>Alas, we hadn't gotten far when an explosion erupted and sent us sprawling.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_515<tab>だが、そうこうするうちに背後で爆発が起こり、
私たちは岩場に吹き飛ばされた。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_516<tab>I struggled to my feet just in time to see the enormous, menacing silhouette of Bahamut looming over Louisoix. In the next instant, he was enveloped in light...and that was the last I remember of him.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_516<tab>どうにか起き上がった私が見たのは、
ルイゾワ様がおられた丘に迫る、黒き龍の影……。
その後、何らかの魔法が発動し、あの方は光に呑まれていった。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_517<tab>Louisoix's final moment...
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_517<tab>それが、賢人ルイゾワの最期……。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_518<tab>Amidst that light, he looked to be smiling. What he was thinking in that moment, I couldn't say, but one thing is certain: we all of us are alive thanks to him.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_518<tab>光の中、ルイゾワ様は微笑んでいたようにも見えた。
その意味は、私のような凡夫には計り知れないが……
我々が生き延びられたのは、あの方のおかげだと確信している。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_519<tab>Hmmm... Following the Calamity, it was reported that Louisoix had defeated Bahamut and set about the land's miraculous regeneration. Do you believe this is the truth?
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_519<tab>ふむ……賢人ルイゾワが「神降ろし」の秘術でバハムートを退け、
再生の奇跡を起こしたという説が霊災後に発表されましたが……
あなたも、それが事実と信じておられるのですね？

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_520<tab>“Every soul who lives to determine their own fate is a source of hope”...
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_520<tab>……人そのものが灯、自らの意思で切り開く未来こそが希望、か。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_521<tab>What we've learned has reaffirmed my belief, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The belief that Louisoix was not an all-powerful savior one reads about in tales, but merely an ordinary man.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_521<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、僕は改めて実感したよ。
ルイゾワは物語の大賢者のような万能の救世主じゃなく、
ただのひとりの人間だったんだって。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_522<tab>But that man never forsook Eorzea. No, he stood for this realm to the last─he and countless other brave souls─and saved it from becoming a scorched waste.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_522<tab>けれどその人は、決してエオルゼアを見捨てなかった。
彼や多くの人たちが懸命に霊災に抗い続けなければ、
この地は本当に焦土となっていただろう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_523<tab>Against unimaginable adversity he fought, and at the cost of his life, paved the way to a brighter future for us all.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_523<tab>彼らは、あらゆる悪意に抗って道を切りひらいたんだ。
……だからこそ、その先の未来で、
僕は賢人ルイゾワの物語を知ることができた。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_524<tab>The least I can do in return is tell his story. Spread his message that, where there is life, there is hope.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_524<tab>なら……僕にできるのは、その物語を伝えることだと思う。
命を守ること、生きて未来を紡ぐことこそが、希望なのだとね。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_525<tab>Thanks to your account, I believe I've found an angle for the biography. I'm truly grateful.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_525<tab>オルンさん、本当にありがとうございました！
あなたの証言のおかげで、
伝記の芯となるものが掴めたように思います！

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_526<tab>Would you care to offer a prayer as well? The prayer that the light of hope which Louisoix preserved shall ever burn bright.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_526<tab>よければ、君たちも運命の女神ニメーヤに祈っていかないか？
ルイゾワ様が遺した希望が、さらなる未来へと繋がるようにね。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_050<tab>The Calamity left deep scars across the realm; there was no place that did not want for help to rebuild.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_050<tab>霊災後、エオルゼアのそこかしこに深い傷痕が残り、
復興には多くの人手が必要となった。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_051<tab>After being saved by our Twin Adder allies, I decided to become an adventurer, the better to honor Louisoix's legacy and lend aid to those in need. During my travels, I often hear your tales, and I'm glad I could share my own with you.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_051<tab>双蛇党に救助された私は、せめてルイゾワ様の志を継ぐべく、
軍務に縛られず市井の人を助けられるよう冒険者となったのだ。
君の噂は聞いている……今回のこと、伝えられてよかったよ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_052<tab>Allow me to thank you again for recounting your experiences to us.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_052<tab>オルンさん、お話を聞かせていただき、
本当にありがとうございました。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_053<tab>Nay, 'tis I who owes you thanks for giving me the chance to share Louisoix's words.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_053<tab>いや、私こそ、
ルイゾワ様の言葉を伝えられてよかった。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_054<tab>All these years, I had avoided speaking of the moment of his passing out of respect, but it would not do to take the tale to my grave. Through the biography, it is my hope that his spirit will live on in all of us.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_054<tab>人の死にまつわることゆえ、好んで語ってはこなかったが……
たしかに、私だけの記憶として墓に持っていくには忍びない。
あの方の想いが伝記として広く知られるのなら、なによりだ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_055<tab>Now then, if you'll excuse me, I shall resume my pilgrimage to the marks. Wherever your travels take you, I shall be praying for your safety.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_ORN_000_055<tab>さて、私は秘石巡礼の途中ゆえ、
ここで失礼させてもらおう。
……世界の片隅から、君たちの旅の無事を願っているよ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_056<tab>Nymeia lilies, the symbol of safe passage... As Louisoix stood there in Carteneau, I wonder if he likewise prayed for someone's safety...
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_056<tab>旅の無事を願う……ニメーヤリリーの花言葉だっけ。
未来への道を繋いだルイゾワも、
同じ気持ちで誰かを想ったりしたのかな……。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_057<tab>At any rate, these interviews have yielded everything I had hoped for and more. Come, let's return to Ul'dah. I'll have your reward for you at Ul'dah at the Hall of Flames.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_057<tab>とにかく、今回の取材は大収穫の大成功だ。
僕らもウルダハに戻ろう、
報酬を用意して、不滅隊：作戦本部前で待ってるよ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_058<tab>There you are. I ended up troubling you longer than I had intended, but it was a truly fruitful series of interviews.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_058<tab>やあ<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、おかえり。
長々と付き合わせちゃったけど、
おかげで、とても充実した取材ができた。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_059<tab>How fortunate that we could hear from those who lived that fateful time. While I still have many questions, the biography is beginning to take shape in my mind.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_059<tab>当時を知る人たちの生の声が聞けたのは、実に幸運だったね。
まだまだ知りたいことは多いけれど……
伝記の核となる要素は、おさえられたと思ってるよ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_060<tab>I also feel as though I've attained a measure of closure.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_060<tab>それに、これまで感じていた、
「救済」への違和感も少しだけ拭えた気がする。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_100_060<tab>Louisoix fought simply as one of us, and he made the ultimate sacrifice that hope might endure. This I've come to realize and appreciate thanks to everyone's heartfelt testimonies.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_100_060<tab>ルイゾワも冒険者もグランドカンパニーの人たちも、
ただ未来に希望を繋ぐため戦った。
皆、必死で……だからこそ今があると、実感できたからかもね。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_061<tab>Now then, last but not least, I'd like to ask you for your thoughts on something.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_061<tab>それで……最後に、君の意見を聞きたいんだ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_062<tab>According to Orn, Louisoix smiled in his final moment. As he was enveloped in light, what do you imagine he held in his mind?
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_062<tab>オルンさんが証言してくれた、ルイゾワの最期の表情。
あのとき彼は何を考え、何を想っていたんだろう……
君は、どう思う？

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_Q2_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_A2_000_001<tab>The image of mankind thriving in the future.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_A2_000_001<tab>未来に生きる人の姿

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_A2_000_002<tab>It's pointless to speculate on such things.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_A2_000_002<tab>それを語るのは野暮だ

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_A2_000_003<tab>The light of hope that shines the way forward.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_A2_000_003<tab>おわりの先の、希望を

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_063<tab>I see, I see... I appreciate your thoughts. As I pen the biography, I'll be certain to remember your words.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_063<tab>なるほど……たしかに、そうかもしれないね。
その言葉を忘れずに、筆を執らせてもらうよ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_064<tab>Well, sad though it is, it's time for us to part ways. I'll set to work on a draft, and I won't rest until the biography goes to print. Thank you for all your help, my friend. I couldn't have come this far without you.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL902_04780_NANANJI_000_064<tab>じゃ、少し名残惜しいけれど、ここでお別れだ。
僕は必ず、ルイゾワの伝記を上梓してみせるよ、
取材を見守ってくれて、本当にありがとう！
